shop.one:
B)uy Items
Se)ll Items
Up)grade Items
H)ome
F)orest

home desc.one:
You are now at home.
If you like to hunt something go to forest.
And if you like to buy/sell something go to shop.

forest desc.one:
You are now at forest.
You can hunt here or go back to home.

shop desc.one:
You are now at a shop.
If you want you can buy or sell items here.

select buy item desc.one:
You are gonna buy an item.
Please select an item to buy.

select sell item desc.one:
You are gonna sell an item.
Please select an item to sell.

select hunt item desc.one:
You are preparing for hunt.
Please select an item to carry.

select upgrade item desc.one:
You are gonna upgrade an item.
Please select an item to upgrade.

wait buy process desc.one:
You are now buying item.
Please wait for a moment to finish the process.

wait hunt process desc.one:
You are now hunting.
Please wait for a moment to finish the process.

wait sell process desc.one:
You are now selling an item.
Please wait for a moment to finish the process.

wait upgrade process desc.one:
You are now upgrading an item.
Please wait for a moment to finish the process.

result buy finish desc.one:
You have bought an item from shop.
Please use it for hunting.

result hunt finish desc.one: You did hunt animals and sold it for gold.

result sell finish desc.one: You sold an item for gold.

result upgrade finish desc.one: You have upgraded item to get better hunt result.

screen size warning.one: Screen is too small. Make your terminal larger. (60x20 minimum)
